mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSTS(ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATED_AT, VIEWS, USER_ID) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(ID) + 1 FROM POSTS), #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd(DY) PM HH:MI:SS'), 0, #{USER_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM POSTS ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT * FROM POSTS, USERS WHERE POSTS.USER_ID = USERS.ID AND POSTS.ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM POSTS WHERE ID = (SELECT MAX(ID) FROM POSTS)
